parameters.name: mask

param_schema.title: Mask
param_schema.description: Black and white image to use as mask for inpainting over the image provided. White pixels are inpainted and black pixels are preserved.

parameters.description: Black and white image to use as mask for inpainting over the image provided. White pixels are inpainted and black pixels are preserved.

parameters.name: seed

param_schema.title: Seed
param_schema.description: Random seed. Leave blank to randomize the seed

parameters.description: Random seed. Leave blank to randomize the seed

parameters.name: image

param_schema.title: Image
param_schema.description: Initial image to generate variations of. Will be resized to height x width

parameters.description: Initial image to generate variations of. Will be resized to height x width

parameters.name: width

param_schema.description: Width of generated image in pixels. Needs to be a multiple of 64

parameters.description: Width of generated image in pixels. Needs to be a multiple of 64

parameters.name: height

param_schema.description: Height of generated image in pixels. Needs to be a multiple of 64

parameters.description: Height of generated image in pixels. Needs to be a multiple of 64

parameters.name: prompt
parameters.default: a vision of paradise. unreal engine

param_schema.title: Prompt
param_schema.default: a vision of paradise. unreal engine

parameters.name: negative_prompt

param_schema.title: Negative Prompt
param_schema.description: Specify things to not see in the output

parameters.description: Specify things to not see in the output

parameters.name: disable_safety_checker

param_schema.title: Disable Safety Checker
param_schema.description: Disable safety checker for generated images. This feature is only available through the API. See [https://replicate.com/docs/how-does-replicate-work#safety](https://replicate.com/docs/how-does-replicate-work#safety)

parameters.description: Disable safety checker for generated images. This feature is only available through the API. See [https://replicate.com/docs/how-does-replicate-work#safety](https://replicate.com/docs/how-does-replicate-work#safety)

mask.description: Black and white image to use as mask for inpainting over the image provided. White pixels are inpainted and black pixels are preserved.

seed.description: Random seed. Leave blank to randomize the seed

image.description: Initial image to generate variations of. Will be resized to height x width
